title: Artifact Field
paragraph: Artifact fields will give your whole team one of many possible effects while you own the field. There are 2 strength-levels of artifacts, whereas the strength/usefulness of the effects granted to your team increases with the strength-level.

dynamicContents.content: During the initial generation of a world, every existing artifact field is randomly assigned an effect according to its strength-level. The effect then stays with the artifact and cannot be changed.\n\n The exact strength of the artifact-effect can vary by a maximum of +300%, though it is extremely unlikely to see values higher than about +75%.

Example: Artifact A has a base effect of granting 10% Attack Buff. Thanks to the variation, the base effect gets increased by 50%, resulting in a total of 15% Attack Buff granted to the team of the artifact owner.

While the artifact field is not owned by any player, you cannot see what effects the artifact contains. 
 While the artifact field is owned by any player (this also includes players outside of your team) the artifact effect is made publicly visible to every player.
Artifact fields exist in 2 different strength levels:

content: Level 1 - Ancient - Can be found in Magic Marsh
Level 2 - Primordial - Can be found in {{ Dark Desert # article/islands/dark-desert }}
